questions.question: 1. A given state diagram have 8 distinct states the number of flip-flops required to make the circuit are

explanations.a: Number of flip-flops required are equal to log(Number of states) with base 2

questions.question: 2. The following data with three inputs A, B, C and one output Y. The output is 1 when the binary value of the input is odd number. The output is 0 otherwise. Then Y is equal to ?

explanations.c: An odd number is decided based upon the LSB in this case LSB is C as a result Y = C

questions.question: 3. For making a mod 6 counter mankar used 3 flip-flops without any gate, then how many states will be skipped

explanations.a: The counter will skip 2 states given by the formula 2^(Number of flip-flops) - number of states which is 2^3 - 6

questions.question: 4. Number of columns in state table for 1 D-Flip-Flop, 2 inputs and 1 output are/is

explanations.b: 2 for input , 2 for D-flips flop (previous and next) and  1 for output

questions.question: 5. Number of rows in state table for 2 D-Flip-Flop, 2 inputs and 2 output are/is

explanations.c: The number of rows is equal to 2 ^ (sum of inputs and D-flip flops)
